testcase.name: Valid customer id and password and response contains the success message
testcase.system-out: Given the customerLogin requests "CustomerLoginRequest".....................passed When Customer provide user name as 925903 and password as password..........passed Then Customer should get valid response from the API........................passed

testcase.name: Invalid customer id and password and response contains the success message
testcase.system-out: Given the customer is requesting "CustomerLoginRequest"....................passed When customer provide invalid user name as 925903 and password as password1234.passed Then customer should get invalid credentials response from the API.........passed

testcase.name: Valid customer id and response contains the success message
testcase.system-out: Given the customerLogin is requesting for "GetCustomerDetails"..............passed When Customer provide customerId as 109106047...............................passed Then Customer should get response from the API..............................passed

testcase.name: Valid customer id and amount and response contains the success message
testcase.system-out: Given the customer is executing "GenerateQRCode"..........................passed When Customer enters customerId 925903 and amount as 12344..................passed Then Customer should receive qr code from api...............................passed

testcase.name: Merchant will read the qr code
testcase.system-out: Given the merchant will execute "ReadQRCode"...............................passed When merchant enter details................................................passed Then merchant should read qr code from api..................................passed
